InstructionData.Title: ic machine
InstructionData.Author: Noob
InstructionData.Instructions:
define door HASH("StructureGlassDoor") define air HASH("StructureAirConditioner") define analyzer HASH("StructurePipeAnalysizer") define evap HASH("StructureEvaporationChamber") define conden HASH("StructureCondensationChamber")
sb door On 1 sb air On 1
main: yield lb r1 analyzer Temperature 0 bgtal r1 269 cooling bltal r1 269 coolingoff sleep 2 sb door On 0 j main
cooling: sbn air HASH("aircool") On 1 sb evap On 1 sb conden On 0 j ra
coolingoff: sbn air HASH("aircool") On 0 sb evap On 0 sb conden On 0 j main
